topic.title: PowerEdge R620 Server
topic.shortdesc: The PowerEdge R620 server is a hyper-dense, two-socket, 1U rack server.

body.p: This server has a large memory footprint and impressive I/O options that make it an exceptional platform for space-sensitive environments. With its hyper-dense memory (up to 768GB in a 1U form factor) and the Intel Xeon processor E5-2600 or E5-2600 v2 product families, the R620 is perfect for virtualization, high-performance computing (HPC), and workgroup collaboration applications.
